Hey Zero Rainbow,

As Horse of Force has mentioned above, it sounds like you could have a corrupt client.
Try repairing your files and if that does not work, I would suggest uninstalling LoL and deleting all files related to the game from your computer.
Then download the game again. That will normally fix most issues.

-ToxicHawk

The game crashing might not at all be related to your connection. If it were a connection issue, then you would get the "Attempting to Reconnect..." message while everything on screen becomes uninteractable.

Have you recently tried repairing your client?
